testimonials.text: That Sthitapragyan must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresher an Under Graduate and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
